document_data.name: Speck
document_data.patron deity: [[Torm]]<ref group="note">[[Erin M. Evans]], in [http://forum.candlekeep.com/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=18594&whichpage=1 a post] on the Candlekeep forum, hinted he was a Chosen of Torm.
document_data.Activities: Speck and his fellow [[Hamdir]] acted as guards for [[Oota]] in a secret [[shadovar]] village for captured Chosen.
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], [[Farideh]] under the orders of [[Adolican Rhand]], identified Speck as a Chosen and he was taken away by the [[shadovar]].
